Blog.post: This old sea reaver's retiring, I've had fun traveling from Dagon Fel to Khorinis, Vivec to Tel Branora but I'm giving up the sea life to star in a sitcom named Method & Red, guess who I am. Song of the Day: What is and What Should Never Be-Led Zeppelin
so is italy, shitty shit shit, now what? i've lost interest in euro cup. Song of the Day:Monaco, oh wait that's a principality. Mayonaisse-Smashing Pumpkins
That's Justin Timberlake's phone number, what a little shit just cuz he's rich he gets a long phone number, infact i'm calling that prick right now. Song of the Day:Every Me Every You-Placebo
emerica this is skateboarding so good. Song of the Day: i already gave you a song for Friday you fucks

shit i missed i few days oh well, its not like the golden horde care. To catch up on news i have officially started making air conditioners as well as starring in shampoo commercials, im the guy in the background of a herbal essence commercial. Song of the Day: Saucerful of Secrets-Pink Floyd
Its gonna be tits. Song of the Day-The Darkness of the Matinee-Franz Ferdinand
i love polk audio. Song of the Day-Geek U.S.A-Smashing Pumpkins
i don't know that i'm a computer. Song of the Day: Wish You Were Here-Pink Floyd

it's a weblog i tricked all of ya with my smooth stapler businessman impersonation. Anyway back to regular schedule. i saw an alien today, it told me to rinse then lather then repeat. but didnt repeat so it told on me, i got a time-out. ah shucks i shoulda repeated. Song of the Day:Little Girls Pointing and Laughing-alexisonfire
do you believe in aliens? song of the day:curves like decoys-.hopesfall.

Doge Vittorio IV The Holy Roman Empire has captured the south wall, now there is little hope for the French. Our armies are wavering as general Billy Bob Thorton has been killed at the battle of Evermore. Yours Truly, HBC Rewards Song of the day: Dogs-Pink Floyd
mysoundclick.ca the only good ska band, a two piece band that go to my school. song of the day: rhinocerus-smashing pumpkins
Hey kids stop downloading, it's bad for your skin like New Zealand. Song of the day: Song of the Remains the Same-Led Zeppelin
i feel so dirty. Song of the Day: Love Song-The Cure
